duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize Natural Language Processing (NLP) and text analytics for data extraction and insights.
Conduct advanced analytics using predictive modeling, machine learning, and simulation modeling.
Integrate and extract relevant information from structured and unstructured data sources.
Develop new research objectives and project priorities based on data analysis and scientific conclusions.
Collaborate with a multidimensional data science team to address complex industry challenges.
Mentor junior team members and contribute to their professional growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, statistics, analytics, mathematics, engineering, or a related scientific field (Master's preferred)
Active secret clearance with the US government
